title: 1922 Tour Of Japan PC w/ Meusel, Stengel & Strunk SOLD

posts.post_title: 1922 Tour Of Japan PC w/ Meusel, Stengel & Strunk SOLD
posts.post_content:
Offered is a PC of the 1922 MLB tour of Japan featuring Irish Meusel, Casey Stengel and Amos Strunk.

[B[STRIKE]]$275[/STRIKE] SOLD

Payment is PP no-fee or add 3.5% for PP Goods & Services. Zelle is also a payment option.

Price includes shipping and insurance within the USA.

If you are interested, or have questions, please email: [url]mpeich12@gmail.com[/url]. 

Thanks for looking!
